description: Try our easy to follow Veal T-Bones with Sage Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Veal T-Bones with Sage Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter, sage, Worcestershire sauce, salt and white pepper in a bowl.
Spoon butter mixture onto a piece of baking paper. Form into a sausage shape and roll in paper. Refrigerate until firm.
Put potatoes into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over a high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 12-15 minutes or until tender. Drain.

Heat a chargrill pan or BBQ hotplate over a medium heat. Season steaks on both sides. When pan is hot, add 2 steaks and cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Cook remaining steaks. Serve steaks with steamed potatoes and rocket & parmesan salad.
To make salad, combine rocket and parmesan in a large bowl. Drizzle with dressing just before serving.
